mdRecord.dcterms:title: Personal Correspondence from Calohill M. Stigleman
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Personal correspondence, letter dated December 31, 1856, from Calohill M. Stigleman, medical student in New York, to unknown person at unknown place, 1 original piece, 3 pages, 1 typed transcription page.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
